## Web3sdksSDK.getContract() method

Get an instance of a Custom Web3sdksContract

## Example

```javascript
const contract = await sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getContract(address: string): Promise<SmartContract>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                          |
| --------- | ------ | ------------------------------------ |
| address   | string | the address of the deployed contract |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SmartContract](./sdk.smartcontract.md)&gt;

the contract
